baseHeroInfo.description: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.

heroicAbilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
heroicAbilities.name: Ultimate Evolution

heroicAbilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
heroicAbilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity

trait.description: Passive: 40% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 5% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near Auriel, damage they deal causes her to gain energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time. Auriel can store up to 505 energy.
trait.name: Bestow Hope

auriel.description: It is through the archangel Auriel that the power of hope flows into the fabric of creation. Her eternal light illuminates even the darkest souls. Seeking harmony in all things, she is a mediator, a counselor, and when the need arises, a fearless warrior.

heroicAbilities.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 damage to all nearby enemies.
heroicAbilities.name: Crystal Aegis

heroicAbilities.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.
heroicAbilities.name: Resurrect

auriel.name: Auriel
auriel.shortDescription: A Healer that excels when paired with a high-octane damage dealer.

skins.description: It is through the archangel Auriel that the power of hope flows into the fabric of creation. Her eternal light illuminates even the darkest souls. Seeking harmony in all things, she is a mediator, a counselor, and when the need arises, a fearless warrior.
skins.name: Archangel of Hope

skins.description: It is said that the power of the Nexus amplifies what lies within a warrior's heart. While Auriel’s countenance has changed, the light of Hope within her is more resplendent than ever.
skins.name: Archangel Auriel

skins.description: For centuries, viewing cherry blossoms at the start of spring has been a time-honored tradition. Auriel was the first omnic to join in the festivities, and has done so every year since she started.
skins.name: Sakura Auriel

skins.description: An angel can never truly become a demon. But once the Lord of Hatred corrupted Auriel's spirit and bound it within a mistress of the Burning Hells, most mortals would struggle to tell the difference.
skins.name: Demonic Auriel

auriel.title: Archangel of Hope

trait.description: Passive: 40% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 5% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near Auriel, damage they deal causes her to gain energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time. Auriel can store up to 505 energy.
trait.name: Bestow Hope

abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 damage on impact. Long range.
abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation

abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 damage per second and last for 10 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior

abilities.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy, dealing 100 damage per second. Damage increases over time, to a max of 200 per second, and is increased by 25% against structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.
abilities.name: All Shall Burn

abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 damage on impact. Long range.
abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation

abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 damage per second and last for 10 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy, dealing 100 damage per second. Damage increases over time, to a max of 200 per second, and is increased by 25% against structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.
abilities.name: All Shall Burn

baseHeroInfo.description: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of Hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary.

heroicAbilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 damage and have 365 health.
heroicAbilities.name: Demonic Invasion

heroicAbilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.name: Black Pool

baseHeroInfo.name: Azmodan

role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.
role.name: Specialist

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Summoner that can also deal high damage from far away.
baseHeroInfo.title: Lord of Sin

trait.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.
trait.name: General of Hell

skins.description: The Demon Lord Azmodan is no stranger to opulence and grandeur. In fact, greed and pride are among his favorite sins.
skins.name: Sinlord Azmodan

skins.description: In the deepest recesses of the Inferno lies the Burning Court, a realm with a single edict set by the first Hoop-Lord: "Thou shalt slam with the best, or thou jammest with the rest."
skins.name: Azmodunk

skins.description: Gul'dan could feel the demon's blood coursing through his veins... Mannoroth's gift once set the orcs on their path, now Azmodan's gift would make them unstoppable.
skins.name: AzGul'dan

azmodan.title: Lord of Sin

trait.name: General of Hell

abilities.description: Deal 274 damage in a small area and 91 damage in a larger area.
abilities.name: Arcane Flare

abilities.description: Polymorph a target for 1.25 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.
abilities.name: Polymorph

abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.
abilities.name: Phase Shift

baseHeroInfo.description: Like many faerie dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!

heroicAbilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204. Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.name: Blink Heal

heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.
heroicAbilities.name: Emerald Wind

baseHeroInfo.name: Brightwing

role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.
role.name: Support

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.
baseHeroInfo.title: Faerie Dragon

trait.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 every 4 seconds.

skins.name: Faerie Dragon

skins.description: The fey magic from which Brightwing draws her power is wild and chaotic. Her very form reflects its unstable nature, ever shifting, like an image from a dream.
skins.name: Fey Dragon Brightwing

skins.description: The magical flying creatures of Sky Temple often cause trouble for the locals. It can be hard to run a successful bazaar when your merchandise disappears into thin air.
skins.name: Flying Monkey Brightwing

skins.description: Just like the flawless butterfly from which she takes her name, Monarch Brightwing has many ways to sting. Kneel peasant! For you face the Monarch! And her wrath is cruel...
skins.name: Monarch Brightwing

brightwing.title: Faerie Dragon

abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 damage to enemies in their path.
abilities.name: Lightning Fury

abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds. Passive: Cassia deals 15% increased damage to Blinded targets.
abilities.name: Blinding Light

abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.
abilities.name: Fend

baseHeroInfo.description: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.

heroicAbilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.
heroicAbilities.name: Ball Lightning

heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
heroicAbilities.name: Valkyrie

baseHeroInfo.name: Cassia

role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
role.name: Assassin

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.
baseHeroInfo.title: Amazon Warmatron

trait.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

skins.name: Amazon Warmatron

skins.description: After her victory against the Prime Evils, Cassia ascended through the ranks of the Askari to become their most legendary commander. The Warmatron’s battle armor is a gift from Queen Xaera herself.
skins.name: Warmatron Cassia

skins.description: From their secret hideout in Kraken’s Cove, Cassia’s fleet of ships unfurl their black sails on a mission to loot and plunder. Mistharbour will soon bow to a new pirate queen.
skins.name: Pirate Queen Cassia

cassia.title: Amazon Warmatron

abilities.name: Flying Kick

abilities.description: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.
abilities.name: Keg Smash

baseHeroInfo.description: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.

heroicAbilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Wandering Keg

heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.
heroicAbilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire

baseHeroInfo.name: Chen

otherAbilities.description: Increase the Attack Speed of the spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.
otherAbilities.name: Fire

otherAbilities.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.
otherAbilities.name: Earth

otherAbilities.description: Increase the Movement Speed of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.
otherAbilities.name: Storm

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.
baseHeroInfo.title: Legendary Brewmaster

trait.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.
trait.name: Fortifying Brew

skins.description: The limitless realms of the Nexus are the perfect place for a world-wanderer like Chen Stormstout. Who knows what secret ingredients and lost tales are waiting to be discovered!
skins.name: Wanderer Chen

skins.description: Why do we fight? To protect home, and family. To preserve balance, and bring harmony. For Chen, the true question is: What is worth fighting for?
skins.name: Brewmaster Chen

skins.description: The loremasters say that coins are a symbol of fortune and luck. During the Lunar Festival, elders hand out Coins of Ancestry to those who seek them out and pay their respects.
skins.name: Lunar Chen

skins.description: The Warmasters serve as the unbreakable front line of Lei Shen's Grand Army. Once the Kaldorei are broken before him, the Well of Eternity will belong to the Thunder King forever.
skins.name: Warmaster Chen

baseHeroInfo.description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.

heroicAbilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Slowing Sands

heroicAbilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.
heroicAbilities.name: Temporal Loop

baseHeroInfo.name: Chromie

otherAbilities.description: Cancel Slowing Sands
otherAbilities.name: Cancel Slowing Sands

role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
role.name: Assassin

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.
baseHeroInfo.title: Keeper of Time

trait.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!
trait.name: Timewalker

skins.description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.
skins.name: Keeper of Time

skins.description: The vestments of a Bronze Dragon are blessed by a power that exists beyond time and space. They are a fragment of both who Chromie was and who she is still yet to be.
skins.name: Timewalker Chromie

skins.description: Despite their immense magical power, Luxorian genies usually guide and influence mortals by appearing in their dreams. Chromie, however, favors a more direct approach.
skins.name: Dream Genie Chromie

skins.description: There are an infinite number of timelines and fixing any one of them can be a tricky proposition. But this one where Chromie is Queen of the Fel Drakes? Yeah, that seems worth looking into.
skins.name: Fel Queen Chromie

chromie.title: Keeper of Time

trait.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!
trait.name: Timewalker

abilities.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds. If Dehaka is stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.
abilities.name: Drag

abilities.description: Deal 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.
abilities.name: Dark Swarm

abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.
abilities.name: Burrow

abilities.name: Burrow

abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground. Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.
abilities.name: Brushstalker

baseHeroInfo.description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.

heroicAbilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Isolation

heroicAbilities.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.
heroicAbilities.name: Adaptation

baseHeroInfo.name: Dehaka

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.
baseHeroInfo.title: Primal Pack Leader

trait.description: Killing an enemy Hero will grant 10 Essence and Minion kills grant 2 Essence. Each Essence consumed heals 29 health over 5 seconds. A maximum of 50 Essence can be stored. Can be cast while channeling.
trait.name: Essence Collection

skins.description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.
skins.name: Primal Pack Leader

skins.description: To the primal zerg, form and function are one. With each change comes greater strength, and thus survival. Few have undergone as much change as Dehaka… and he intends to keep it that way.
skins.name: Pack Leader Dehaka

skins.description: Zerus-class mech D3-H4K4 was developed to gather Kaijo DNA mid-combat. Troublingly, the onboard AI has begun rejecting orders, extracting "essence" from its own targets.
skins.name: Mecha Dehaka

abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 75 damage and gaining 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second and take an additional 150 damage.
abilities.name: Shadow Charge

abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 54 damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 81 damage.
abilities.name: Fire Stomp

abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.
abilities.name: Overpower

baseHeroInfo.description: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.

heroicAbilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Apocalypse

heroicAbilities.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.
heroicAbilities.name: Lightning Breath

baseHeroInfo.name: Diablo

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.
baseHeroInfo.title: Lord of Terror

trait.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.
trait.name: Black Soulstone

diablo.description: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.

diablo.shortDescription: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.

skins.description: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.
skins.name: Lord of Terror

skins.description: The heroes thought shattering his soulstone on the Hellforge would end his reign. Now, adorned with the forge's remnants, he would shatter every bone in their bodies in return.
skins.name: Hell Iron Diablo

skins.description: After twenty years, all seven essences swirled within the Black Soulstone. With Adria’s final betrayal, the seven were combined into one, giving rise to a reborn Diablo... the Prime Evil.
skins.name: Prime Evil Diablo

skins.description: Bringing a whole new meaning to "Holy Terror."
skins.name: Archangel Diablo

skins.description: It is with hushed whispers the fishermen of Stormwind speak of the Lord of the Depths. His very name an eternal curse upon any angler foolish enough to speak it aloud: Lurkablo.
skins.name: Lurkablo

skins.description: The scientists of Tristram Labs had grown overconfident. They believed the power of the atom was finally under their control. They were wrong.
skins.name: Kaijo Diablo

diablo.title: Lord of Terror

trait.name: Black Soulstone

abilities.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.
abilities.name: Boosters

abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.
abilities.name: Defense Matrix

abilities.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.
abilities.name: Self-Destruct

abilities.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.
abilities.name: Boosters

abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.
abilities.name: Defense Matrix

abilities.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.
abilities.name: Self-Destruct

baseHeroInfo.description: Hana Song, also known as "D.Va," is both a world champion professional gamer and a burgeoning global icon. As a member of South Korea’s elite MEKA unit, she fights to protect her homeland from the colossal omnic threat lurking within the East China Sea.

heroicAbilities.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds. Requires Mech Mode.
heroicAbilities.name: Bunny Hop

heroicAbilities.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit. Requires Pilot Mode.
heroicAbilities.name: Big Shot

baseHeroInfo.name: D.Va

otherAbilities.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.
otherAbilities.name: Call Mech

otherAbilities.description: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her Movement Speed is reduced by 15%.
otherAbilities.name: MEKAout

otherAbilities.description: Dash towards the target location, passing through enemies along the way.
otherAbilities.name: Torpedo Dash

otherAbilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.
otherAbilities.name: Concussive Pulse

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A hard-to-kill Bruiser that can peel enemies away from her allies with high disruption.
baseHeroInfo.title: MEKA Pilot

trait.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

skins.description: Being a pro has its perks: sponsorship deals, an adoring fan base, customized polyfusion sequencers for your personal mecha... you know, little things.
skins.name: Pro D.Va

skins.description: Few mechs are as versatile as the goliath combat walker. Armed with the latest aftermarket upgrades, Corporal Song can call in a new walker from TACCOM whenever she gets the go-ahead.
skins.name: Goliath D.Va

dva.title: MEKA Pilot

trait.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.
trait.name: Mech Mode

abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

baseHeroInfo.description: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.

heroicAbilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Mosh Pit

heroicAbilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Stage Dive

baseHeroInfo.name: E.T.C.

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.
baseHeroInfo.title: Rock God

skins.description: Some bands paint their faces and play death metal. E.T.C. however, IS death metal.

skins.description: After E.T.C's pickup truck broke down and his dog died there was really only one thing left for him to do-- go country! Time to bring a whole new meaning to cowboy.
skins.name: Pure Country E.T.C.

skins.description: The Elite Tauren Chieftan has been rocking the world for a long time, man. He's seen fashions come and fashions go, but neon pants and feathered hair? Those are forever.
skins.name: Glam Metal E.T.C.

heroicAbilities.name: Hinterland Blast

heroicAbilities.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

skins.description: Much like other clans and races will don warpaint as they head into battle, the Wildhammer Dwarves will adorn themselves with their gryphon's feathers.
skins.name: Gryphon Master Falstad

skins.description: To this day, Captain Falstad and the crew of the Wildhammer honor the pirate's code set by Mistharbour's Council of Three Anchors. Of course, some say those rules are merely guidelines…
skins.name: Buccaneer Falstad

skins.description: During the War of Three Hammers, no Wildhammer was as feared as the Storm Lords. Their stormhammers forced the Bronzebeards to adopt new weapons and strategies.
skins.name: Storm Lord Falstad

falstad.title: Wildhammer Thane

baseHeroInfo.description: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.

heroicAbilities.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 1.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Warlord's Challenge

heroicAbilities.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.
heroicAbilities.name: Decimate

baseHeroInfo.name: Garrosh

otherAbilities.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds. While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

baseHeroInfo.description: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.

heroicAbilities.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.
heroicAbilities.name: Robo-Goblin

heroicAbilities.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 damage.
heroicAbilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000

baseHeroInfo.name: Gazlowe

role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.
role.name: Specialist

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.
baseHeroInfo.title: Boss of Ratchet

trait.name: Salvager

skins.name: Boss of Ratchet

skins.description: A wise man once said, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it." Gazlowe has never heard of this man... and if he had, he might punch him in the gut for saying stuff like that.
skins.name: Chief Engineer Gazlowe

skins.description: From the martian landscape, Gazlowe gazed upon the Earth with jealous eyes. Soon that glittering sapphire would be his... but first, Super Sonya must be dealt with.
skins.name: Mad Martian Gazlowe

skins.description: So they think Gazlowe and Gallywix's Splendiferous Extravaganza has lost its edge, huh? Yeah, well... I got a new act in mind... This one'll knock 'em dead. Guaranteed.
skins.name: Big Top Gazlowe

gazlowe.title: Boss of Ratchet

abilities.name: Shuriken

abilities.name: Deflect

baseHeroInfo.description: Once the carefree youngest scion of the Shimada clan, Genji was cut down by his own brother for refusing to take part in their illegal ventures. Grafted into a cyborg body by Overwatch, Genji walks his own path as one who fights for what's right.

heroicAbilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.
heroicAbilities.name: Dragonblade

heroicAbilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 damage to enemies in their area.
heroicAbilities.name: X-Strike

baseHeroInfo.description: Abandoning the ways of shamanism, Gul'dan entered a pact with the demon lord Kil'jaeden and betrayed his people in exchange for limitless power. With the orcish Horde under his master's thrall, both Draenor and Azeroth nearly fell into his grasp.

heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
heroicAbilities.name: Horrify

heroicAbilities.description: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.
heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Destruction

skins.description: Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.
skins.name: Queen of Blades

skins.description: The primal zerg essences within Kerrigan cannot remain static for too long. With every kill, they incorporate their foe's strengths, becoming increasingly deadly... and spikey.
skins.name: Primal Queen Kerrigan

skins.description: Among all the demons of the Burning Legion, the succubi are the ones who are most delighted by inflicting anguish upon their foes. Mistress Kerrigan is far better at it than most.
skins.name: Legion Mistress Kerrigan

skins.description: Unsurprisingly, cheerleading for the Burning Courts can be extraordinarily demanding. As team captain, Kerrigan has little patience for squad members who can’t take the heat.
skins.name: Cheerleader Kerrigan

skins.description: Fully cleansed by the Xel'Naga Artifact, Kerrigan joined forces with Jim Raynor and Prince Valerian. Armed with the latest Umojan tech, they prepare to bring Arcturus to justice once and for all.
skins.name: Queen of Ghosts Kerrigan

skins.description: Countess Sarah von Kerrigan's bloodthirst knew no bounds. It was only a matter of time before the Vampire Slayers of Raven Court rose up against her reign of terror.
skins.name: Countess Kerrigan

skins.description: Kerrigan, the Queen of Suffering, rules over her brood of succubi with a fel iron fist. Warlocks brash enough to summon her risk facing her terrible vengeance.
skins.name: Succubus Kerrigan

kerrigan.title: Queen of Blades

baseHeroInfo.description: Madness. Betrayal. Death. These are the legacy of the Black King Leoric's reign. Driven to madness by the spirit of Diablo, Leoric brought untold suffering on his kingdom. Even after his death there was no release for the Skeleton King.

heroicAbilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Entomb

heroicAbilities.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and swings his mace three times, healing himself for 12% of his maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 damage.
heroicAbilities.name: March of the Black King

baseHeroInfo.name: Leoric

otherAbilities.description: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
otherAbilities.name: Ghastly Swing

otherAbilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.
otherAbilities.name: Drain Essence

otherAbilities.description: Activate to gain Protected for 3 seconds.
otherAbilities.name: Shroud of the Dead King

skins.description: These ornamental warplates were once a symbol of the holy Zakarum faith. Now, they serve only as a stark reminder of its demonic corruption.
skins.name: Zakarum Leoric

skins.description: The Space Lord has brought countless worlds to heel in the name of the Eternal Empire. Soon, even the Earth's troublesome Star Princesses will fall to the power of the darkness.
skins.name: Space Lord Leoric

skins.description: King Leoric used his legendary might to strike down every jarl who challenged his ascent to the throne. But not even uncontested rule is enough to slake his thirst for power.
skins.name: God-King Leoric

skins.description: Leoric held the Winterskorn Chieftain's skull aloft for the gathering crowd to see. "Who else among you wishes to challenge me?" The silence was deafening.
skins.name: Vrykul Leoric

baseHeroInfo.description: Born upon Shen-zin Su, the Wandering Isle, Li Li Stormstout led an uneventful life until she began reading her uncle Chen's journals. Soon, nothing would sate her desire for adventure, exploration, and pestering adventurers around Halfhill.

heroicAbilities.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies within 10 range, restoring 1632 Health over 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups

heroicAbilities.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Water Dragon

skins.description: Born upon Shen-zin Su, the Wandering Isle, Li Li Stormstout led an uneventful life until she began reading her uncle Chen's journals. Soon, nothing would sate her desire for adventure, exploration, and pestering adventurers around Halfhill.

skins.description: When you've wandered as much of the world as Li Li has you learn many things... but perhaps the most important is that it's always wise to carry an umbrella.
skins.name: Adventurer Li Li

skins.description: When faced with an opponent as powerful as the Thunder King, honorable combat is simply not an option. To attain victory, one must strike from the shadows. Li Li has taken this lesson to heart.
skins.name: Shadowblade Li Li

skins.description: Not all pandaren were willing to serve as the Thunder King's army of Warmasters. Even now, rumors persist of a rebellion; a resistance born within the shadows.
skins.name: Shadowpaw Li Li

skins.description: Each new year brings with it untold promise. It is a joyous time when we honor those who came before us, while celebrating the endless possibilities ahead of us.
skins.name: Lunar Li Li

skins.description: The Explorer's League is known for their progressive stance on accepting members of all races into their ranks. If you've got a heart that longs for adventure and discovery, you're in!
skins.name: Explorer Li Li

li-li.title: World Wanderer

baseHeroInfo.description: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?

skins.description: Once, only wizards who had spent countless hours braving the inferno were able to attain the fabled archon armor. Those who adorned it were both respected and feared. Then came transmog...
skins.name: Archon Li-Ming

skins.description: To Li-Ming, the Lunar Festival of the Nexus was not so dissimilar from those of her homeland, Xiansai. Donning her favored finery, she joined in celebration with a nostalgic joy.
skins.name: Lunar Li-Ming

skins.description: Li-Ming is an avid student of magic, but it was her skills on the court that scored her a scholarship at the Yshari Sanctum. As team captain, she intends to lead the Vizjerei Fireflies to victory.
skins.name: Striker Li-Ming

skins.description: All seemed lost as the star princesses fell one after another. But Li-Ming’s refusal to give up hope awakened a new power inside her, transforming her into the legendary Star Queen.
skins.name: Star Queen Li-Ming

skins.description: For eons, Earth has been protected by the magical Star Princesses. Together, they stand against the evil Eternal Empire and its Space Lords in the name of love and friendship.
skins.name: Star Princess Li-Ming

li-ming.title: Rebellious Wizard

baseHeroInfo.description: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.

baseHeroInfo.description: While her younger sisters frolicked in idyllic forests, Lunara watched as mortals exploited nature’s splendor. On Azeroth, her father Cenarius forbade her from retaliating. But this is the Nexus, and it’s time for nature to take its revenge.

skins.description: As her power grew, Lunara began to hear the wilds of the Nexus crying out for a champion. They granted her untold power, and she granted them ruthless protection.

skins.description: When the war was finally over, the Betrayer Malfurion sat in chains. Unable to return to an idyllic life in the wilds, Lunara joined the Watchers in order to keep an eye on their accursed prisoner.
skins.name: Warden Lunara

skins.description: Lunara, the festive Dryad, has a very pointy spear. And if you ever see it, you should prob'ly run in fear.
skins.name: Winter Veil Lunara

skins.description: Lunara watched as the betrayer Malfurion’s fel magic consumed her beloved wilds. When High Priestess Shadowsong called upon the dryads to join the Sentinels, she was the first to volunteer.
skins.name: Sentinel Lunara

otherAbilities.name: Astral Communion

malfurion.shortDescription: A strong sustained Healer who can help lockdown enemies to secure takedowns.

skins.description: Malfurion Stormrage is the greatest druid on Azeroth, and a student of the demi-god Cenarius. Communing with nature and Cenarius through the Emerald dream, Malfurion protects the wilds from demonic influences.
skins.name: Archdruid

skins.description: Malorne the Waywatcher's power transcends death itself. Those who dedicate their lives to fighting for nature carry on his great work.
skins.name: Waywatcher Malfurion

skins.description: Majordomo Stormrage felt the change instantly. Though only a small spark, it was enough to signify his incantations had finally broken through. When the Firelord arrived, the Nexus would burn.
skins.name: Druid of the Flame Malfurion

skins.description: Sargeras's whispers of power were impossible for the broken Malfurion to resist. She had called him "Betrayer"... Soon, they would all call him Master.
skins.name: Betrayer Malfurion

skins.description: Although Broll Bearmantle had saved the Archdruid's life, it had cost him his own. Even now, Malfurion wears his armor to remind himself of the sacrifices that saved Hyjal.
skins.name: Storm Mantle Malfurion

malfurion.title: Archdruid

probius.description: Since his activation, Probius has always wanted to prove himself. He may be small, but he made a big difference by warping in a critical pylon during the retaking of Aiur. As the bravest of probes, Probius is eager to fulfill his purpose in the Nexus.

heroicAbilities.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Pylon Overcharge

heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

baseHeroInfo.description: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.

heroicAbilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 damage. Enemies in the center take 594 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Sulfuras Smash

heroicAbilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

baseHeroInfo.description: Ex-Confederate Marshal James Raynor has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.

baseHeroInfo.description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.

baseHeroInfo.description: From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.

heroicAbilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Leap

heroicAbilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
heroicAbilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker

baseHeroInfo.name: Sonya

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and likes to dive into the enemy team.
baseHeroInfo.title: Wandering Barbarian

trait.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
trait.name: Fury

skins.description: From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.
skins.name: Wandering Barbarian

skins.description: The Valor of Harrogath is not opulent armor... It is simple, direct... and a perfect fit for warrior like Sonya.
skins.name: Valorous Sonya

skins.description: A barbarian’s vigil never ends. Donning the armor and wielding the weapons she wrests from the clutches of her foes, Sonya stands as a bulwark against all demons... no matter where they come from.
skins.name: Legion's Wrath Sonya

skins.description: While traveling through time, the gladiatrix Sonya was exposed to a radioactive robo-virus. Without a way home, she fights tirelessly to keep the streets of New York safe.
skins.name: Super Sonya

skins.description: The portal-loving treasure goblins collect their spoils from many worlds. There's no telling which hero this Battlegear of Wrath once belonged to, but it's doubtful they are still alive to miss it.
skins.name: Wrath Sonya

sonya.title: Wandering Barbarian

abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.
abilities.name: Hook

abilities.description: Deal 104 damage to enemies within the target area.
abilities.name: Slam

abilities.description: Deal 319 damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.
abilities.name: Devour

abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.

abilities.name: Devour

abilities.description: Pull the first ally or enemy hit towards Stitches. Enemies are temporarily stunned and take 91 damage. When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.
abilities.name: Helping Hand

baseHeroInfo.description: Take care when traversing the shadowed trails of Duskwood... Ever since Abercrombie the Embalmer unleashed his vile abomination upon Darkshire, Stitches has wandered the road aimlessly, hungering for the flesh of low level Alliance players.

heroicAbilities.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Putrid Bile

heroicAbilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.
heroicAbilities.name: Gorge

baseHeroInfo.name: Stitches

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Tank who wants to isolate distant enemies away from their team.
baseHeroInfo.title: Terror of Darkshire

trait.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that poisons nearby enemies for 68 damage over 3 seconds.
trait.name: Vile Gas

skins.description: Stitches no bozo... Stitches king!
skins.name: King Stitches

skins.description: The feast of Great-Winter is a magical time of year. It seems like everyone is getting into that Winter Veil spirit! Even if we kinda wish they wouldn't...
skins.name: Greatfather Winter Stitches

skins.description: Splish-splash! Hot and ready for the summer sun, Bikini Stitches is off to meet the ghoul of his dreams... that and make a sandcastle!
skins.name: Bikini Stitches

skins.description: What? Everybody needs a day job... Just don't order the "veal."
skins.name: Chef Stitches

skins.description: The Crystal Lake of Elwynn Forest hides a horrifying secret beneath the depths of its murky waters...
skins.name: Psycho Stitches

trait.name: Vile Gas

abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 240 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.
abilities.name: Healing Pathogen

abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 damage upon expiring or being removed.
abilities.name: Weighted Pustule

abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 144 damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.
abilities.name: Lurking Arm

abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 240 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.
abilities.name: Healing Pathogen

abilities.name: Lurking Arm

baseHeroInfo.description: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...

heroicAbilities.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
heroicAbilities.name: Flailing Swipe

heroicAbilities.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 200 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
heroicAbilities.name: Massive Shove

baseHeroInfo.name: Stukov

role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.
role.name: Support

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.
baseHeroInfo.title: Infested Admiral

trait.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 500 health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds. Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.
trait.name: Bio-Kill Switch

skins.description: Decades ago, a mutiny forced the Admiral of the Three Anchors to walk the plank. On moonless nights, his form haunts Blackheart's Bay, calling itself "Krakenov" and demanding a lot of fish.

abilities.name: Withering Fire

abilities.description: Deals 37 damage and an additional 148 damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

baseHeroInfo.description: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.

heroicAbilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.
heroicAbilities.name: Wailing Arrow

heroicAbilities.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement, Silencing them and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Mind Control

baseHeroInfo.name: Sylvanas

otherAbilities.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Stores up to 3 charges.
otherAbilities.name: Possession

role.name: Specialist

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.

skins.description: The guise of a Dark Ranger strikes fear into the hearts of their enemies. The guise of the Dark Ranger Queen will send them running for reinforcements...

skins.description: Sugar and spice? Maybe. Everything nice? Not by a long shot.
skins.name: Sugar Plum Sylvanas

skins.description: The Ranger-Generals are the commanders of the Farstriders of Quel'Thalas. It is their solemn duty to ensure the protection of Silvermoon, or give their lives in its defense.
skins.name: Ranger-General Sylvanas

abilities.name: Plasma Shield

abilities.description: Deal 88 damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

baseHeroInfo.description: An Executor without equal, Tassadar has fought tirelessly to purify the Koprulu sector of zerg infestation. Only now, after learning to wield the power of the void, is Tassadar finally ready to face the Overmind and its all-consuming Swarm.

heroicAbilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 166 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 83 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.
heroicAbilities.name: Archon

heroicAbilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds. Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.
heroicAbilities.name: Force Wall

baseHeroInfo.name: Tassadar

role.name: Support

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Support who can enable damage dealers who like to dive the enemy team.

skins.description: Executors rarely command from the field of battle, but their Regalia is fitted with meticulously crafted khaydarin crystals to amplify their psionic powers should the need arise.
skins.name: Executor Tassadar

skins.description: Pharaoh Ta-sadar knew the power of the darkworld would consume his realm, but Luxoria would still survive... Better the Nexus devour his kingdom than the Scorpid Swarm.
skins.name: Crypt King Tassadar

skins.description: The Kaijo Diablo could not be contained; cities worldwide had been reduced to cinders. Now humanity's survival hangs upon the untested mecha, Tassadar.
skins.name: Mecha Tassadar

tassadar.title: Savior of the Templar

abilities.description: Deal 110 damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.
abilities.name: Hamstring

abilities.description: Deal 37 damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done. Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.
abilities.name: Butcher's Brand

abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 damage.
abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught

abilities.description: Deal 110 damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 damage.
abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught

baseHeroInfo.description: An unrelenting hacking echoed off the walls of the Cathedral and as Prince Aidan made his way through its depths, the sound only grew louder. There were no screams; just that dreadful sound... over and over.

heroicAbilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter

heroicAbilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.
heroicAbilities.name: Furnace Blast

baseHeroInfo.name: The Butcher

role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
role.name: Assassin

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who starts slow, but deals extreme damage after collecting enough Meat.
baseHeroInfo.title: Flesh Carver

trait.description: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 25 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 10 Fresh Meat upon dying. Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat. Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.
trait.name: Fresh Meat

skins.description: An executioner's hood hides their identity and discourages offended parties from seeking revenge. Of course, that won't be a problem for the Butcher.

skins.description: Abathur's newest creation was inspired by the tenacity of the hellish abominations he encountered in the Nexus. Its instructions were simple: Acquire fresh essence. Evolve.
skins.name: The Butcherlisk

skins.description: There are many Butchers within the Burning Hells, but only those who serve Duriel, the Lord of Pain, bolt plates of burning iron to their flesh.
skins.name: Iron Butcher

abilities.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.name: Jump!

abilities.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.name: Spin To Win!

abilities.description: All Vikings gain a 110 to 220 point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.
abilities.name: Norse Force!

abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.
abilities.name: Select Olaf

abilities.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.
abilities.name: Select Baleog

abilities.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.
abilities.name: Select Erik

abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
abilities.name: Go Go Go!

baseHeroInfo.description: The Lost Vikings are back! While they briefly considered retirement after defeating the emperor Tomator, there were only so many polar bears they could wrestle before falling into a Nexus portal seemed like a solid life decision.

heroicAbilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds. Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.
heroicAbilities.name: Longboat Raid!

heroicAbilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.
heroicAbilities.name: Play Again!

baseHeroInfo.name: The Lost Vikings

skins.description: Now sporting the finest equipment a Viking can illegally procure from an evil alien overlord's robot army.
skins.name: Sequel Lost Vikings

skins.description: While "Party in Pajamaland" is technically a part of the Expanded Universe, the storyline is still considered a seminal work in the Lost Vikings mythos.
skins.name: Pajama Party Lost Vikings

the-lost-vikings.title: Triple Trouble

trait.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

baseHeroInfo.description: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.

heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.name: Sundering

skins.name: Earthbreaker Thrall

skins.description: Go'el, the new Warlord of the Ashwolf clan, lifted the shattered Doomhammer from the Blackrock chieftain's corpse. Of his father's betrayers, only Gul'dan remained.

baseHeroInfo.description: Lena Oxton (call sign: "Tracer"), is both an adventurer and an irrepressible force for good. With the ability to alter her own time at will, she fights the good fight wherever she goes--even the Nexus. Don't worry, loves. The cavalry's finally here. Tracer is FREE to purchasers of Overwatch™: Origins Edition

heroicAbilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 420 damage to them and 210 damage to other nearby enemies. This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

baseHeroInfo.description: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.

skins.description: With her enchanted arrows and her keen insight into the hearts of mortals, the Love Goddess is responsible for more than one match made in heaven.

skins.description: Ever since they were children, Tyrande had known her fate was bound to that of Malfurion's. Now, she would serve as his warden, and for his betrayal the sentence would be eternal.

baseHeroInfo.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.

heroicAbilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

heroicAbilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

trait.name: Vanish

auxiliaryHeroInfo.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.

heroicAbilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.
heroicAbilities.name: Smoke Bomb

heroicAbilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.
heroicAbilities.name: Cloak of Shadows

auxiliaryHeroInfo.name: Valeera

otherAbilities.description: Ambush the target, instantly dealing 180 damage to the target. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.
otherAbilities.name: Ambush

otherAbilities.description: Deal 30 damage to an enemy and stun them for 1.25 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.
otherAbilities.name: Cheap Shot

otherAbilities.description: Garrote an enemy, dealing 20 damage instantly, an additional 140 damage over 7 seconds, and silencing them for 2.25 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.
otherAbilities.name: Garrote

role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
role.name: Assassin

auxiliaryHeroInfo.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.

skins.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.
skins.name: Shadow of the Uncrowned

skins.description: There's no actual proof Valeera infiltrated Blackwing Lair and slew its master at the bequest of her king... but, I mean, there wouldn't be, would there?
skins.name: Bloodfang Valeera

skins.description: The difference between Valeera and her enemies was simple. They would stop at nothing to destroy Azeroth, whereas she would sacrifice everything to save it.
skins.name: Demon Hunter Valeera

auxiliaryHeroInfo.title: Shadow of the Uncrowned

abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 151 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 86 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.
abilities.name: Hungering Arrow

abilities.description: Deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area.
abilities.name: Multishot

abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.
abilities.name: Vault

abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 151 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 86 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.
abilities.name: Hungering Arrow

abilities.description: Deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area.
abilities.name: Multishot

abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.
abilities.name: Vault

baseHeroInfo.description: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.

heroicAbilities.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Strafe

heroicAbilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Vengeance

baseHeroInfo.name: Valla

role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
role.name: Assassin

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.
baseHeroInfo.title: Demon Hunter

trait.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.
trait.name: Hatred

valla.description: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.

valla.name: Valla
valla.shortDescription: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.

skins.description: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.
skins.name: Demon Hunter

skins.description: Demon hunters share few traditions as each walks their own unique path... but a master passing on their armor is an honor few refuse. Valla would wear Josen's mantle with pride.
skins.name: Vengeance Valla

skins.description: No one settled disputes on the lawless streets of Riksville faster than Valla de Hunter. When Marshal Raynor began to deputize a posse, she was the first gunslinger on his list.
skins.name: Deputy Valla

skins.description: Inarius was dead, and his disciples would be forever changed. Hatred burned within Valla's angelic heart, but she knew, if it could be tempered, it would be a powerful weapon.
skins.name: Angelic Valla

skins.description: The Countess's thirst for blood could not be quenched even by death. As the vampire swarm spread across Raven Court, a group of survivors rose up to resist them.
skins.name: Vampire Slayer Valla

valla.title: Demon Hunter

trait.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.
trait.name: Hatred

abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.name: Lion's Fang

abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%. Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.name: Parry

abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and slowing them by 75% for 1 second.
abilities.name: Charge

abilities.name: Lion's Fang

abilities.name: Charge

baseHeroInfo.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.

heroicAbilities.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.
heroicAbilities.name: Taunt

heroicAbilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.
heroicAbilities.name: Colossus Smash

heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.
heroicAbilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury

multiclassRoles.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
multiclassRoles.name: Assassin

baseHeroInfo.name: Varian

role.description: Multiclass Heroes defined by their talents rather than role.
role.name: Multiclass

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.
baseHeroInfo.title: High King of the Alliance

trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 bonus Spell damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
trait.name: Heroic Strike

skins.name: High King of the Alliance

skins.description: The Lion has long been associated with the nation of Stormwind and the House of Wrynn. It is a symbol of courage, dignity and ferocity; truly befitting for the High King.
skins.name: Lionheart Varian

skins.description: After awakening on the shores of Durotar, the gladiator known as Lo'Gosh became a star of the Crimson Ring Arena. Rumor has it that he fights with the fury of the Ghost Wolf himself.
skins.name: Lo'Gosh Varian

heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.
heroicAbilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury

varian.name: Varian

role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.
role.name: Warrior

roleSecondary.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.
roleSecondary.name: Assassin

varian.shortDescription: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.

skins.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.
skins.name: High King of the Alliance

skins.description: The Lion has long been associated with the nation of Stormwind and the House of Wrynn. It is a symbol of courage, dignity and ferocity; truly befitting for the High King.
skins.name: Lionheart Varian

skins.description: After awakening on the shores of Durotar, the gladiator known as Lo'Gosh became a star of the Crimson Ring Arena. Rumor has it that he fights with the fury of the Ghost Wolf himself.
skins.name: Lo'Gosh Varian

varian.title: High King of the Alliance

trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 bonus Spell damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
trait.name: Heroic Strike

abilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 240 damage to enemies.
abilities.name: Spectral Scythe

abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.
abilities.name: Cursed Strikes

abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds. All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

baseHeroInfo.description: From the recesses of the eastern jungles comes a man cloaked in mystery. As a member of the secretive Priests of Rathma, or the Necromancers, Xul wields powerful death magic and fights to preserve the delicate balance between order and chaos.

heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Poison Nova

heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Skeletal Mages

skins.name: Cryptic Necromancer

skins.description: Cloaked in foreign garb, Xul returned from his fight against the Prime Evils as a Master Necromancer. He chose to mentor only a single apprentice, a promising student named Mehtan.
skins.name: Necromaster Xul

skins.description: Farmer Saldean looked at the empty pole with confusion. Hadn't he hitched up that new Scarecrow? In his bewilderment he missed the words scratched into the dirt, "It's time to harvest."
skins.name: Scarecrow Xul

skins.description: While the Serpent King acted as Pharaoh Ta-sadar’s vizier, his true loyalty had always belonged to the Spider Queen. Once he saw his chance, Xul’s betrayal was as swift as a serpent’s strike.
skins.name: Serpent King Xul

baseHeroInfo.description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.

heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
heroicAbilities.name: Devouring Maw

heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Nydus Network

skins.description: As his Queen ordered, Abathur augmented Zagara, allowing her more flexible thinking and a stronger control over her brood... but there's always room for more improvement.

skins.description: The sands of Luxoria are ever-shifting. In ancient times, they were ruled by the Scorpid Swarm, and if the ancient Queen Zagara has her way, they shall be once again.
skins.name: Desert Queen Zagara

skins.description: Dr. Wright hypothesized only insects could survive in the apocalypse. Years later, as the mutated hivemother's pincers closed around his neck, he realized how right he was.
skins.name: Insectoid Zagara

zagara.title: Broodmother of the Swarm

baseHeroInfo.description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.

heroicAbilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Graviton Surge

heroicAbilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.name: Expulsion Zone

skins.description: Armed with their Mjolnir Cannons, Zarya Aleksdottir and the Thunder Guard serve as the Midgard megalopolis' last defense against the Jotunheim Republic and their frost golem army.

baseHeroInfo.description: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.

heroicAbilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.
heroicAbilities.name: Void Prison

heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.name: Shadow Assault

skins.name: Dark Prelate

skins.description: Upon selection, each Dark Prelate is presented with a unique armor reflecting their beliefs and personality. Zeratul rarely dons the Shadow's Embrace, as he prefers less formal attire.
skins.name: Dark Prelate Zeratul

skins.description: In his final moments, Zeratul made the ultimate sacrifice to defeat the Overmind and secure victory over the zerg. Inspired by his example, the Templar and Dark Templar are united once more.
skins.name: Executor Zeratul

skins.description: The Zer'atai clan of Dark Templar are renowned hunters. For nearly a millennium, they have wandered across Shakuras, fashioning intricate armors from the bones of their prey.
skins.name: Zerg Hunter Zeratul

skins.description: After failing to protect his lord from the Lenassa clan, Zeratul severed his nerve cords and his connection to his home. Now he wanders, searching for a way to atone for his sins.
skins.name: Ronin Zeratul

skins.description: Despite Judicator Raszagal's warning that only heresy comes from contact with the Dark Ones, Praetor Zeratul believes that this "Tassadar" may be the key to Aiur's salvation.
skins.name: High Templar Zeratul

zeratul.title: Dark Prelate

baseHeroInfo.description: Before the elves and their Alliance, the forests of Lordaeron belonged to the trolls of the Amani empire. As their warlord, Zul'jin has united the tribes into an army that stands ready to take back what is theirs and to slay the elves who stole it from them.

heroicAbilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!
heroicAbilities.name: Taz'dingo!

heroicAbilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
heroicAbilities.name: Guillotine

skins.description: The Emberlords seldom leave their molten domains, choosing to emerge only when the earth’s rage demands retribution. Once they are on the warpath, nothing can withstand their fury.
